@@info: Here are translations that exist in <en> but not in <es-ES>.
After editing this file, you can run 'dart run slang apply --locale=es-ES' to quickly apply the newly added translations.

networkInterfacesPage.title: Network Interfaces
networkInterfacesPage.info: By default, LocalSend uses all available network interfaces. You can exclude unwanted networks here. You need to restart the server to apply the changes.
